mapper.sql: id, name, sex, age, position, major, seniority, jobNumber, phone, code, creator, lastModifier, createDate, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE fs_doctor_info
name = #{map.name},
sex = #{map.sex},
age = #{map.age},
position = #{map.position},
major = #{map.major},
seniority = #{map.seniority},
jobNumber = #{map.jobNumber},
phone = #{map.phone},
code = #{map.code},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fs_doctor_info
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND sex like CONCAT('%', #{sex} , '%')
AND age like CONCAT('%', #{age} , '%')
AND position like CONCAT('%', #{position} , '%')
AND major like CONCAT('%', #{major} , '%')
AND seniority like CONCAT('%', #{seniority} , '%')
AND jobNumber like CONCAT('%', #{jobNumber} , '%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
